mapper.sql: ID , COMPLAINT_PERSON, RIGHT_TYPE, RELATION_RIGHT, COMPLAINT_NUMBER, PROCESSING, NODE, HANDLE_PERSON, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED
mapper.insert: insert into complaints_work_info (complaints_id, complaint_person, complaint_person_id, handle_person_id, handle_person, info_source, relation_right, right_type, complaint_number, node, processing, is_distribution, handle_record, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{complaintsId}, #{complaintPerson}, #{complaintPersonId}, #{handlePersonId}, #{handlePerson}, #{infoSource}, #{relationRight}, #{complaintType}, #{complaintNumber}, #{node}, #{processing}, #{isDistribution}, #{handleRecord}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select count(*) from complaints_work_info where handle_person_id=#{mId} and id in ( select complaints_work_id from complaint_work_info where complaint_work_info.id in #{item}) and processing<1 and right_type=#{rightType}

select count(*) from complaints_work_info where handle_person_id=#{mId} and id in ( select complaints_work_id from complaint_work_info where complaint_work_info.id in #{item}) and processing=1 and right_type=#{rightType}

select count(*) from complaints_work_info where handle_person_id=#{mId} and id in ( select complaints_work_id from complaint_work_info where complaint_work_info.comment_id in #{item}) and processing<1 and right_type=#{rightType}

select count(*) from complaints_work_info where handle_person_id=#{mId} and id in ( select complaints_work_id from complaint_work_info where complaint_work_info.comment_id in #{item}) and processing=1 and right_type=#{rightType}
select count(*) from complaints_work_info where handle_person_id = #{mId} and complaint_person like "%"#{complaintPerson}"%" and processing<1 and right_type=#{rightType}
select count(*) from complaints_work_info where handle_person_id = #{mId} and complaint_person like "%"#{complaintPerson}"%" and processing=1 and right_type=#{rightType}
